nodes.text: Mak Medagazy was a male Toong mercenary who operated a battle droid carrier during the Republic Dark Age. In c. 1032 BBY, Medagazy was among a group of mercenary leaders that were summoned to the Sanctum Celestial on the planet Darkknell by the Sith Lord Daiman. There, Daiman briefed Medagazy and the other mercenaries about a planned ambush on the forces of the Sith Lord Odion, which was set to take place on the world Gazzari. Afterwards, Medagazy flew to Gazzari and participated in the battle there.
